name: Detox Green Clay Mask for Face - 3-Clay Blend with Kaolin Volcanic Clay - Deep Pore Cleansing, Removes Excess Oil, Tightens Pores - Oil-Free, Paraben-Free
short_description: DEEP PORE CLEANSING: Experience the power of our Clay Mask, formulated to cleanse and reveal your skin's natural radiance. This mask works to refresh your complexion, leaving you with a clean and rejuvenated feeling that lasts. Pamper yourself with a spa-like treatment at home.
CLEANS AND SOOTHES THE SKIN: If you experience oily skin, this mask helps cleanse and balance the skin's appearance. At the same time, you will feel the soothing effect of this deep-cleansing mask.

VOLCANIC FRENCH GREEN CLAYS: Made with simple, clean, and natural ingredients specifically chosen for their unique benefits. Illite helps exfoliate dead skin cells, Montmorillonite helps refresh the skin’s surface, and Kaolin absorbs excess oils. While they help cleanse the skin, glycerin and propanediol keep it moisturized.

EXPERIENCE A PERSONAL SPA INDULGENCE: Treat yourself to a soothing spa indulgence at home with this pore-cleansing mask. Relax and let your skin absorb the goodness of this hydrating face mask. Enjoy the refreshing feeling as your complexion glows.

THE TOUGH WOMAN: We believe that self-care should never be a compromise. Our brand was born out of a deep understanding of the modern woman's needs, crafting skincare solutions that seamlessly fit into your busy lifestyle, empowering you to embrace every moment with confidence and radiance.
product_description: Revitalize your skin with The Tough Woman French Clay Mask. This mask is formulated with simple, pure ingredients extracted from volcanic earth in France. The mix of illite, montmorillonite, and kaolin clays helps refresh the skin. These clays combine with high-performing ingredients like glycerine and propanediol in a comforting texture. This natural face clay mask doesn't tug or pull your skin after you apply it, making it an ideal part of your skincare ritual. Leave it on for five to ten minutes, remove it with water, and enjoy your wonderfully vibrant face! It is one of the safest and best skincare products for women of all skin types.

short_description: [CARDI B’S 2-MINUTE PORE DETOX CLEANSER] Featured in Cardi B’s skincare routine, this 2-in-1 clay mask cleanser works as a quick wash-off mask and daily facial cleanser to help deliver a powerful deep pore cleanse in just 2 minutes—perfect for blackhead-prone, oily skin.

[6-CLAY BLEND PORE DECONGESTING CARE] Formulated with a 6-clay blend to help lift pore impurities and target whiteheads, blackheads, and stubborn sebum plugs. It also helps remove excess oil and dead skin buildup that can clog pores for a cleaner-looking finish.

[GREEN TOMATO FIRMING CARE] Powered by 49% Green Tomato Extract rich in Tomatidine and Vitamin C, this formula helps improve the look of pores while supporting skin elasticity for a firmer, smoother complexion.

[NON-DRYING DEEP CLEANSING] Unlike typical clay cleansers, this gentle face wash for women delivers a refreshing deep pore cleanse without leaving skin feeling tight or stripped, making it perfect for daily use.

[FRAGRANCE-FREE & VEGAN FORMULA] Made without synthetic fragrance or essential oils to help minimize irritation. Dermatologically tested and 100% vegan, making it a gentle daily cleanser for all skin types, including sensitive skin.

name: Cetaphil Clay Mask, DermaControl Purifying Clay Face Mask with Bentonite Clay for Blackheads and Pores, Designed for Oily, Sensitive Skin, 3 Oz
short_description: CETAPHIL DERMACONTROL PURIFYING CLAY MASK: A luxuriously creamy clay mask designed to purify skin and deep clean pores, leaving skin feeling ultra clean and refreshed

ABSORBS EXCESS OIL & HELPS IMPROVE SKIN TONE: Bentonite clay absorbs surface oil and pore clogging impurities, while pure Amazonian Kaolin clay provides gentle exfoliation to lift away dead skin cells
NOURISHES SENSITIVE SKIN: Apple fruit extract helps maintain skin hydration, while cucumber seed extract (rich in oleic acid) helps brighten skin tone
HYPOALLERGENIC AND NONCOMEDOGENIC: Fragrance free, and will not irritate the skin or clog pores
DESIGNED FOR SENSITIVE SKIN: All CETAPHIL products are effective yet non-irritating
product_description: New, luxuriously creamy Cetaphil PRO Dermacontrol Purifying Clay Mask purifies and deep cleans pores to leave your oily and sensitive skin feeling ultra clean and refreshed. With two types of clay and fruit and vegetable extracts, the unique formula does not dry, ensuring skin isn't left tight or dried out. The Bentonite clay absorbs oil and pore-clogging impurities, minimizing the appearance of pores, while Amazonian kaolin clay gently exfoliates to lift away dead skin cells and help improve skin tone and texture. Apple fruit extract helps maintain skin hydration, and cucumber seed extract is rich in oleic acid to help brighten skin tone. Designed with sensitive skin in mind, Cetaphil Purifying Clay Mask is fragrance free, hypoallergenic and non-comedogenic, so it won't irritate skin or clog pores. To minimize excess oil and shine, use with Cetaphil PRO Dermacontrol Oil Removing Foam Wash and Cetaphil PRO Dermacontrol Oil Absorbing Moisturizer SPF 30 for a gentle skin care routine.
